title: Ep. 332 - Notre Dame Isn’t A Museum—It’s A Church
description:
The façade of Notre Dame remains, but the heart of the 800-year-old cathedral has been turned to ash. Is there any more fitting metaphor for the state of Western Civilization? We analyze appearance versus reality from Paris to the 2020 presidential primaries. Date: 04-16-2019
